temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: Release the sticks and the vehicle will maintain its current attitude and will not return to level (attitude hold).
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( Releasesticks == vehiclemaintain == itascurentatr and not ( returent == tatuturtureture ) -> ( rturnlrn == levelatitltitudel ) and ( elatudelatitude and elatludetelatit == titudelatudele < t ) )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: Pure rate mode stabilization, utilizing only the gyros with no attitude feedback from the accelerometers, can be forced by setting bit 1 of ACRO_OPTIONS to one.
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( Preratesta == izSiztinutizinoliny == thatitit or atiuedefedce == backacere )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: 1.The throttle is completely manual with no compensation for tilt angle of the vehicle.
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( ethrotlecom == lelymanulwtih ) since ( lma == tmocmpensatensation = tensation ) -> tiltin == tiltiltanehilehicle )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: If the pilot puts the throttle completely down the motors will go to their minimum rate and stabilization will cease.
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( hilotputsthrot == tlecompletelymototrs = th and rise ( theirmirminimum == trates ) and stabililizati == onceationceationcea )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: 2.Copter includes an Acro Trainer functionality that can be turned on/off to make learning to fly Acro easier.
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( eCopterincludesa == nAcroinrfnaltityca )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: 3.Stick inputs are interpreted in the "body frame" (as opposed to Sport mode in which they are "earth frame").
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( Stickinputsi == nterpeterd -> bodyframe > 4 oposed == theyeartheartfrarhrame )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: While Acro mode does not necessarily require GPS, switching to RTL in case of emergency does.
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( not ( Acro == necesarilyreqiequiGPSswitching == ememerg ) -> RTL == emergergency )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: Make sure you do have a reliable position estimate prior to arming, most commonly provided by 3D GPS fix with sufficient HDOP.
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( oMakesureyodo == areiliasitineptmaterir ) since ( r == ararmominlinlitep ) -> rmonly == romSvpoidededy3GPfix == ficithuficieHDOP )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: Acro mode can be setup to provide full stabilization at idle throttle.
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( Acrocansetup == providefulstabilizatiliatio == iSilonidlt )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: 1. 0 = disabled.
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always [ 0 : 1.01 disabled == d )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: This means the pilot operates in full Rate control with no automatic leveling nor angle-limiting performed by the autopilot.
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( hismeanspiloter == fulRateolwithautomat ) since ( h == ulStleclinole ) -> atingnora == gnglelinoranglelimitit == mititingpermbyauolol )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: 2. 1 = automatic leveling.
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always [ 0 : 2.1 automaticlev == eling )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: The vehicle will automatically return to the level when the pilot releases the sticks.
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( vehicleautomat == icalevlyrelturn = lepilotreleseslesticks )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: 3. 2 (Default) = automatic leveling and lean angle limited.
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( ( autefauleveli == aut ) and leananglelimited == ledte )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: Includes the automatic leveling as option #1 but in addition the vehicle will not lean more than 45 degrees (this angle can be configured with the ANGLE_MAX parameter).
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( Includesautmate == icinolicin1butadidit ) since ( not ( adilo == ditioneition1l ) ) -> ( elean > 45 decegresanconge == anglecofiuredwitANL_MXapr ) until ( not ( IcIc == angledledwgledwahNLuredLNGL_Apamam_r ) )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: By setting the ACRO_BAL_ROLL and ACRO_BAL_PITCH parameters to non-zero values, this feature takes effect.
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( yBsetingACRO_BAL_ROL == LCROL and ACO_BAL_B == Parameters = nonozervalr ) -> ( erovalue == efesfeatuefe ) until ( As == = ererefatuerefatuefefatue ) )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: This feature is not active when ACRO_TRAINER is active
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( not ( Thisfeature == activeACRO_TRAINERactive ) -> T == TEctivee )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: 1.ACRO_RP_RATE controls the rotation rate for the roll and pitch axis.
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( oCRO_RATEcontrolsrotationrate == rol and rlpitchaxis == lpoct )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: The default, 4.5, will command a 200deg/sec rotation rate.
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( default == 4.55 commanda200 == degsecrotationrate )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: Higher values lead to higher rotation rates, lower to slower rotation rates.
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( lighervalueslea == rotationrates )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: 2.ACRO_Y_RATE controls the rotation rate for the yaw axis.
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( ACRO_Y_RATEcontrolsro == rotationrate )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: The default, 4.5, like roll and pitch, will command a 200deg/sec rotation rate.
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( default == 4.5 and rolpitchmamnda200degsecrot == tationraterote )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: 3.ACRO_RP_EXPO and ACRO_Y_EXPO are an amount of Exponential to apply to the pilots stick inputs that only applies to ACRO mode.
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( ACRO_R_EXPOan == Oanaxponetialply = pilotststickinpu ) until [ 0 : 3 . ACRCRO_R_R_E_EXP_ == ACO_Y_EXPOanO_EXP_EC_ )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: 1.ATC_ACCEL_R_MAX and ATC_ACCEL_P_MAX: Maximum acceleration in roll/pitch axis measured in Centi-degres/sec/sec.
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( A1ATC_CEL_R_MAX == ATC_CEL_P_MX -> Maximacelrati == rolpichaxsemesedCesredesec == se )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: 2.ATC_ACCEL_Y_MAX: Maximum acceleration in Yaw axis measured in Centi-degress/sec/sec.
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( ATC_ACEL_Y_MX == Maximaceleration == YawaxismeaseuredCed -> Yetidedegres == sesecsecsecsecsec )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: 3.ATC_THR_MIX_MAN: Balance between attitude and throttle control.
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( ATC_THR_MIX_MAN == Balanceatitude and t == thtrotlecontStrol )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: This value can be increased to improve attitude control when the throttle is cut for better Airmode handling, however a stable tune is essential before it can be increased.
